# WMI and Performance Counters (Unmanaged API Reference)

> Documentation for WMI and Performance Counters (Unmanaged API Reference).

*Topics available: 52*

- [BeginEnumeration function (Unmanaged API Reference)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/wmi/beginenumeration.md): The BeginEnumeration function resets an enumerator to the beginning of the enumeration
- [BeginMethodEnumeration function (Unmanaged API Reference)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/wmi/beginmethodenumeration.md): The BeginMethodEnumeration function begins an enumeration of the object's methods
- [BlessIWbemServices function (Unmanaged API Reference)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/wmi/blessiwbemservices.md): The BlessIWbemServices function indicates whether user credentials permit access to an IWbemServices class.
- [BlessIWbemServicesObject function (Unmanaged API Reference)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/wmi/blessiwbemservicesobject.md): The BlessIWbemServicesObject function indicates whether user credentials permit access to an IWbemServices object
- [Clone function (Unmanaged API Reference)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/wmi/clone.md): The Clone function returns a new object that is a complete clone of the current one.
- [CloneEnumWbemClassObject function (Unmanaged API Reference)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/wmi/cloneenumwbemclassobject.md): The CloneEnumWbemClassObject function makes a logical copy of an enumerator.
- [CompareTo function (Unmanaged API Reference)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/wmi/compareto.md): The CompareTo function compares an object to another WMI object.
- [ConnectServerWmi function (Unmanaged API Reference)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/wmi/connectserverwmi.md): The ConnectServerWmi function uses DCOM to create a connection to a WMI namespace.
- [CreateClassEnumWmi function (Unmanaged API Reference)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/wmi/createclassenumwmi.md): The CreateClassEnumWmi function returns an enumerator for all classes that satisfy specified criteria.
- [CreateInstanceEnumWmi function (Unmanaged API Reference)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/wmi/createinstanceenumwmi.md): The  CreateInstanceEnumWmi function returns an enumerator containing instances of a specified class that meet selection criteria.
- [Delete function (Unmanaged API Reference)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/wmi/delete.md): The Delete function deletes the specified property and all of its qualifiers from a CIM class definition.
- [DeleteMethod function (Unmanaged API Reference)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/wmi/deletemethod.md): The DeleteMethod function deletes the specified method from a CIM class definition.
- [EndEnumeration function (Unmanaged API Reference)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/wmi/endenumeration.md): The EndEnumeration function terminates an enumeration.
- [EndMethodEnumeration function (Unmanaged API Reference)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/wmi/endmethodenumeration.md): The EndMethodEnumeration function terminates a method enumeration sequence.
- [ExecNotificationQueryWmi function (Unmanaged API Reference)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/wmi/execnotificationquerywmi.md): The ExecNotificationQueryWmi function executes a query to receive events.
- [ExecQueryWmi function (Unmanaged API Reference)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/wmi/execquerywmi.md): The ExecQueryWmi function executes a query to retrieve objects.
- [FormatFromRawValue function (Unmanaged API Reference)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/wmi/formatfromrawvalue.md): The FormatFromRawValue function converts raw performance data to a specified format.
- [Get function (Unmanaged API Reference)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/wmi/get.md): The Get function retrieves the specified property value.
- [GetCurrentApartmentType function (Unmanaged API Reference)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/wmi/getcurrentapartmenttype.md): The GetCurrentApartmentType function retrieves the type of apartment in which the caller is executing.
- [GetDemultiplexedStub function (Unmanaged API Reference)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/wmi/getdemultiplexedstub.md): The GetDemultiplexedStub function creates an object forwarder sink to assist a client in receiving asynchronous calls from Windows Management.
- [GetErrorInfo function (Unmanaged API Reference)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/wmi/geterrorinfo.md): The GetErrorInfo function retrieves error information from the previous function call.
- [GetMethod function (Unmanaged API Reference)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/wmi/getmethod.md): The GetMethod function retrieves information about a method.
- [GetMethodOrigin function (Unmanaged API Reference)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/wmi/getmethodorigin.md): The GetMethodOrigin function determines the class in which a method is declared.
- [GetMethodQualifierSet function (Unmanaged API Reference)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/wmi/getmethodqualifierset.md): The GetMethodQualifierSet function retrieves a method's qualifier set.
- [GetNames function (Unmanaged API Reference)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/wmi/getnames.md): The GetNames function retrieves the names of the properties of an object.
- [GetObjectText function (Unmanaged API Reference)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/wmi/getobjecttext.md): The GetObjectText function returns a textual rendering of an object in MOF syntax.
- [GetPropertyHandle function (Unmanaged API Reference)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/wmi/getpropertyhandle.md): The GetPropertyHandle function returns a unique handle that identifies a property.
- [GetPropertyOrigin function (Unmanaged API Reference)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/wmi/getpropertyorigin.md): The GetPropertyOrigin function determines the class in which a property is declared.
- [GetPropertyQualifierSet function (Unmanaged API Reference)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/wmi/getpropertyqualifierset.md): The GetPropertyQualifierSet function retrieves the qualifier set for a property.
- [GetQualifierSet function (Unmanaged API Reference)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/wmi/getqualifierset.md): The GetQualifierSet function retrieves the qualifier set for a class or instance.
- [WMI and Performance Counters (Unmanaged API Reference)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/wmi/index.md): Summarizes the .NET Framework unmanaged API for WMI and performance counter information.
- [InheritsFrom function (Unmanaged API Reference)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/wmi/inheritsfrom.md): The InheritsFrom function determines whether a class or instance derives from a particular parent class.
- [Initialize function (Unmanaged API Reference)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/wmi/initialize.md): The Initialize function performs WMI initialization.
- [Next function (Unmanaged API Reference)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/wmi/next.md): The Next function retrieves the next property in an enumeration.
- [NextMethod function (Unmanaged API Reference)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/wmi/nextmethod.md): The NextMethod function retrieves the next method in an enumeration.
- [Put function (Unmanaged API Reference)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/wmi/put.md): The Put function assigns a new value to a named property.
- [PutClassWmi function (Unmanaged API Reference)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/wmi/putclasswmi.md): The PutClassWmi function creates a new class or updates an existing one.
- [PutInstanceWmi function (Unmanaged API Reference)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/wmi/putinstancewmi.md): The PutInstanceWmi function creates or updates an instance of an existing class.
- [PutMethod function (Unmanaged API Reference)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/wmi/putmethod.md): The PutMethod function creates a method.
- [QualifierSet_BeginEnumeration function (Unmanaged API Reference)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/wmi/qualifierset-beginenumeration.md): The QualifierSet_BeginEnumeration function resets an enumerator of the qualifiers of an object.
- [QualifierSet_Delete function (Unmanaged API Reference)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/wmi/qualifierset-delete.md): The QualifierSet_Delete function deletes a qualifier by name.
- [QualifierSet_EndEnumeration function (Unmanaged API Reference)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/wmi/qualifierset-endenumeration.md): The QualifierSet_EndEnumeration function terminates an enumeration.
- [QualifierSet_Get function (Unmanaged API Reference)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/wmi/qualifierset-get.md): The QualifierSet_Get function gets a named qualifier.
- [QualifierSet_GetNames function (Unmanaged API Reference)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/wmi/qualifierset-getnames.md): The QualifierSet_GetNames function retrieves the names of qualifiers from an object or property.
- [QualifierSet_Next function (Unmanaged API Reference)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/wmi/qualifierset-next.md): The QualifierSet_Next function retrieves the next qualifier in an enumeration.
- [QualifierSet_Put function (Unmanaged API Reference)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/wmi/qualifierset-put.md): The QualifierSet_Put function writes the named qualifier and its value.
- [ResetSecurity function (Unmanaged API Reference)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/wmi/resetsecurity.md): The ResetSecurity function assigns an impersonation token to the current thread.
- [SetSecurity function (Unmanaged API Reference)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/wmi/setsecurity.md): The SetSecurity function retrieves the current thread's impersonation token.
- [SpawnDerivedClass function (Unmanaged API Reference)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/wmi/spawnderivedclass.md): The SpawnDerivedClass function creates a new object that derives from an object.
- [SpawnInstance function (Unmanaged API Reference)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/wmi/spawninstance.md): The SpawnInstance function creates a new instance of a class.
- [VerifyClientKey function (Unmanaged API Reference)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/wmi/verifyclientkey.md): The VerifyClientKey function ensures the client key has the correct security.
- [WritePropertyValue function (Unmanaged API Reference)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/wmi/writepropertyvalue.md): The WritePropertyValue function writes bytes to a property.
